name: WAVE (Sam)
description:
WAVE is a procedurally generated 3D Vaporwave maze explorer.

It was developed by Samuel Braley and Corbin Rogerson as a final project for their game technology course. It was made using Unity, and we've uploaded the Unity project file for the game down below, so feel free to download it and play around with the source code! We only ask that, should you use any part of the project in your own game/project/whatever, simply credit us and link back to this page.

The in game music is all by Drake McIntosh, definitely check out his other work.

We use the Farland Skies - Cloudy Crown asset pack, so definitely check that out.

You can find Sam at samuelbraley.xyz and Corbin at LinkedIn.

Made with <3 in Austin, TX.
